Kantilal Jivan Shah, nke a maara dị ka Kanti (1922 ruo  Ọktoba 22 afọ 2010) ka e kwuru na ọ bụ onye kachasị dee banyere Seychellois

[nkọwa dị mkpa] A kọwara ya dị ka Renaissance Man, ọ bụ onye guru, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọkachamara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, onye na-ahụ maka nkwụ, onye na-esi nri, onye na-ese foto, onye na-ese ihe na-akpụ ihe, onye na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo na onye nwere ọgụgụ isi.
E gosipụtara ya na ihe karịrị otu narị akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin na mmemme redio na telivishọn
Ọ bụ onye ọbịa nke ụfọdụ ndị nwere mmetụta zuru ụwa ọnụ dị ka Queen Elizabeth II na Mother Teresa nye Ian Fleming, onye kere James Bond
Nke ikpeazụ gosipụtara Jivan dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na akwụkwọ akụkọ Bond ikpeazụ ya
O mekwara ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Omar Sharif

Jivan na-azụ ahịa mbupụ na mbubata nke nna ya guzobere na 1895, mana a maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ nke gburugburu ebe obibi na njem nlegharị anya na dị ka onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịnala
Ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii nke òtù dị iche iche dịka Alliance Francaise, Chamber of Commerce and Industry na Seychelles Environment Trust Fund.
E tinyere ya na UN Environmental Program Global 500 Roll of Honour ma Royal Norwegian Academy of Sciences and Letters kwanyekwara ya ùgwù
Kantilal tinyere aka na ngafe nke iwu nke nyere aka ịmepụta Ste
Anne Marine National Park na Port Launay Marine National Park
O nyekwara aka n'itinye iwu na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi dị ka Iwu Nchedo nke Shells; Nchedo Anụmanụ na Nnụnụ; Nchịkwa nke àkwá nnụnụ; Nchedo nke Turtles; na Seychelles Marine Mammal Sanctuary.
Jivan nwụrụ na Ọktoba 22 n'afọ 2010 na Victoria Hospital, Mahe, Seychelles mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asaa ma nwee nwa nwoke na nwa nwa.
